name: text_overlays
rule: Non-diegetic on-screen text (headers like 'cheeseburger' or 'pickle') must NOT be baked into kie.ai renders. Render clean scenes with kie.ai and add text using Shotstack overlay layers in post.
examples: GOOD: kie.ai renders moon/sun scenes; Shotstack adds 'cheeseburger' and 'pickle' headers.
BAD: kie.ai prompt includes 'text overlay', causing baked-in text artifacts.
guidelines: Treat headers and captions as overlays for clarity and timing control.
Only bake text when physically part of the scene (diegetic).
Emit overlay copy and timing as structured metadata for Alex.
